question: Joule/kg is the S.I unit of which of these physical quantities?
explanation: Joule/kg is the S.I unit of Latent heat Latent heat(L) = heat(Q)/mass(m) Latent heat is the heat required to convert a solid into a liquid or vapor, or a liquid into a vapor, without any change in temperature. Unit of Entropy: J/K Unit of Permittivity of free space: H/m Unit of Gas constant : J/K
